tests.summary: No popup message display when accessing Regul section directly
tests.description: Verify that no popup message is displayed when a user accesses the Regul section directly
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the user is on the Regul section
When the user comes directly to the Regul section
Then no popup message should be displayed

tests.summary: SIM swap required before switching to 5G
tests.description: Verify that a user needs to swap their SIM to a USIM first in order to switch to 5G
tests.cucumberScenario:
Given the user has a Plugin SIM
When the user tries to switch directly to 5G without swapping it to a USIM
Then an error message should be displayed indicating that a USIM swap is required before switching to 5G

testSets.description: Auto-generated test set for User Story SNAPS-1571
